attributes.additional_details: Captain Moore at the age of 99 years old has went above and beyond to raise money for our NHS during this Pandemic, Captain Moore is a man worthy of a Knighhood.
attributes.background: We want Captain Tom Moore to be given a Knighthood for the outstanding achievement of raising millions of pounds for our NHS during the Corona Virus Pandemic.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
